title: Disclaimer
intro: Rignum is an automated index of publicly available third-party references about markets (e.g., stocks, crypto, FX, macro).
We display metadata and external links only. We do not host or reproduce third-party text.

sections.heading: What Rignum is
bullets: An indexing and navigation service for public references.
Metadata-only cards (categories, tags, source name/type, timestamps).

sections.heading: What Rignum is NOT
bullets: Not financial advice, investment advice, legal advice, or tax advice.
Not a broker, dealer, exchange, intermediary, or trading platform.
Not research, analysis, forecasting, “signals”, or recommendations.
Not a publisher or host of third-party content.

sections.heading: Unverified third-party content
paragraphs: References shown on Rignum may be subjective, incomplete, false, misleading, manipulated, or outdated.
Rignum does not verify accuracy and does not endorse any viewpoint.

sections.heading: External links
paragraphs: Clicking “Open source” takes you to a third-party website. That content is outside our control and governed by the third party’s policies.

sections.heading: Automated classification
paragraphs: We may use automated systems (including AI) to classify references into predefined categories and tags.
Classification is non-evaluative and may be inaccurate; it is not an assessment of truth or outcomes.

sections.heading: Limitation of liability
paragraphs: To the maximum extent permitted by law, Rignum is not liable for losses arising from use of the Service or third-party content accessed via links.

footer: External sources • Content not hosted • Unverified • No advice • No recommendations
